events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering cluster. Our team will proceed with the next steps accordingly.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the selection process.
Our recruiter completed an initial screening call to discuss your experience and fit for the software engineer role at our company.
You responded promptly and positively to our initial screening follow-up, expressing enthusiasm for the upcoming interviews.
Your technical interview with our engineering panel has been scheduled to assess your software development skills in detail.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating a strong understanding of coding principles and problem-solving approaches.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals, company culture fit, and available benefits in more detail.
